sentences.en: A school would not accept low-quality work from any student.
sentences.cn: 学校不会接受任何学生质量不合格的作业。

sentences.en: Did you learn anything in your day, as a student?
sentences.cn: 你在学生时代学到什么东西了吗？

sentences.en: Different teachers make different contributions to a student's growth.
sentences.cn: 不同的教师在学生的成长过程中起到不同的作用。

sentences.en: He was the top student in physics.
sentences.cn: 他是物理尖子.

sentences.en: He’s obviously an excellent student of human nature.
sentences.cn: 显然他对人性的研究很深入。

sentences.en: In 1978 there were 884 students at a lecturer/student ratio of 1:15.
sentences.cn: 1978年有884名学生，师生比为1比15。

sentences.en: Jake would not countenance Janis's marrying while still a student.
sentences.cn: 杰克不会同意贾尼斯还在上学就结婚。

sentences.en: One of the perks of being a student is cheap travel.
sentences.cn: 当学生的好处之一是旅行购票可以优惠。

sentences.en: Several colleges in our study have rigid rules about student conduct.
sentences.cn: 在我们的研究中，有几所大学制定了严格的学生行为规则。

sentences.en: Several options are offered for the student's senior year.
sentences.cn: 为毕业班学生开设了几门选修课。

sentences.en: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.cn: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.en: The club specialises in videoing its student golfers to correct their faults.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部专门为高尔夫学员制作录像，以纠正他们的错误。

sentences.en: The dead student is now being regarded as a martyr.
sentences.cn: 这位死去的学生现在被视为烈士。

sentences.en: The fact of the matter is that student finances are stretched.
sentences.cn: 关键是奖学金有限。

sentences.en: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.cn: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

sentences.en: The student trotted out his knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这个学生炫耀他的知识。

sentences.en: This book is intended for the general reader rather than the student.
sentences.cn: 这本书面向一般读者而非学生。

sentences.en: Warren's eldest son is an art student, at St Martin's.
sentences.cn: 沃伦的大儿子是圣马丁学院艺术系的学生。

sentences.en: Warren's eldest son is an art student.
sentences.cn: 沃伦的长子是一名学艺术的学生。

sentences.en: We should require that every student is immunized against hepatitis B.
sentences.cn: 我们应要求每个学生都注射乙肝疫苗。

phrases.tran_cn: 外国学生，外籍学生；留学生

trans.tran_cn: 学生，大学生，研究者，学者，中学生，<美俚>初学者
trans.tran_en: someone who is studying at a university, school etc
someone who is studying at a university, school etc
